full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA DZAMBHA LA SER PO MCHOD PA'I CHO GA BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES 'PHAGS PA DZAMBHA LA SER PO MCHOD PA'I CHOG BSAM 'PHEL YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI HO SHO CHING WANG SHOG GI MGON SDE'I KHAM TSAN PHUN TSOGS DON GRUB GLING GI BLA MA LAS SNE BA RNAMS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR SNGAGS RAMS PA BSHAD SGRUB BSTAN DAR ZHES BYA BAS BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI BKRA SHIS RDO RJE ZHES BYA BAS BGYIS PA'O, ,)
